mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_crs_onln_sbj A, tb_crs_sbj_ctgr B WHERE A.SBJ_CTGR_CD = B.SBJ_CTGR_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND
B.SBJ_CTGR_PATH like CONCAT('%',#{item},'%')
AND A.ORG_CD = #{orgCd}
AND CONCAT(A.SBJ_NM,A.SBJ_CD) like CONCAT('%',#{sbjNm},'%')
AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.SBJ_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', NVL(#{sbjNm},''), '%') AND A.SBJ_CD NOT IN ( SELECT SBJ_CD FROM tb_cro_open_crs_sbj WHERE CRS_CD = #{crsCd} ) ORDER BY A.SBJ_NM
